## Welcome to DataFest 2025! {.unnumbered .unlisted}
Welcome to the official website of the first-ever DataFest at Northwestern! The event includes a competition, interaction with people in Data Science in industry and academia, lots of food, and prizes!

## Event details

**Date:** Friday, April 4 at 5 pm - Sunday, April 6 at 7 pm

**Venue:** Guild lounge on April 4 & 6, Wildcat room 1-163 on April 5

**Participants:** All UG students are invited to participate, while graduate students are invited to mentor student teams.

You will have approximately 48 hours to analyze a dataset, develop and present solutions to achieve the desired objective to a panel of judges.
